item.title: Social media platforms are using what you create for artificial intelligence. Here’s how to opt out - CNN
item.description:
1. Social media platforms are using what you create for artificial intelligence. Here’s how to opt out  CNN

  5. LinkedIn’s 930 Million Users Unknowingly Train AI, Sparking Data Privacy Concerns  PYMNTS.com
